This application was developed in order to provide an easy way for people to view fixtures and results for their favourite teams. I am a footballer from Laois who plays for O\'Dempseys football club. This club means a lot to me and I wanted to provide something back to the GAA community because of the way I have been treated over the years. The GAA commuity is special in how everyone interacts and enjoys the matches. This application just makes it easier for viewing when matches are coming and the results of previous matches. This application will be continuously developed for as long as possible and updates will be forthcoming.
If there are bugs or issues you would like to highlight, please do not hesitate to contact me through my email address.
Please rate my application and realise that I am constantly improving the application and will work to make sure any issues are fixed ASAP.
